attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Force take away food outlets to print the registration number of all vehicles and stick them on all the packaging that they have when they purchase their food and drink. All litter dropped can then be traced and the offender fined. This will help clean up the Country.

rejection.details: Your title should be a call for action, not a statement / name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
